# shiny_markov_text

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

A demo shiny app that uses the [**markovtext**](https://github.com/chris31415926535/markovtext) package to generate random text using Markov chains.

For details, see the Github page for [**markovtext**](https://github.com/chris31415926535/markovtext).
